pages.text: When any of the following pairs of elements exist at the same time and the former is a strong element, the phase reaction will be triggered. The reaction consumes the previous element and produces the latter element. The occurrence of a generation reaction will have a beneficial effect on the entity involved.
Crystallization(Earth -> Metal): Instant reaction. The entity gains damage absorption effect. The intensity of reaction determines the level of damage absorption effect.

Quench Blade(Metal -> Water): Continuous reaction. The entity will attach all additional water elements to the next active attack, depending on the maximum damage received during the reaction (including those that have been blocked). The reaction intensity determines the attachment amount of water elements.
Growing(Water -> Wood): Continuous reaction. The entity restores a certain amount of health. The intensity of the reaction determines the amount of blood.
Flaming(Wood -> Fire): Continuous reaction. The entity spreads the fire element to the surrounding entity. The reaction intensity determines the amount of fire element attachment.
Ashing(Fire -> Earth): Instant reaction. The entity gains spiritual and gains health when spiritual is full. The intensity of the reaction determines the amount obtained.
